author: Globetrotter_AS_1966
title: Nice hotel/ Good location - Review
text: Very nice hotel near Stade de France with modern and nice design. Excellent executive rooms. Good breakfast buffet in a nice breakast room. Nice staff. Clean and spacious hotel. Excellent location next to metro station (direct line to Champs Elys√©es) and tramway station for area of Sarcelles. Good price/ performance relation.
